headline: UBS Lowers Firm’s PT on Schlumberger Limited (SLB), Keeps a Buy
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the Most Undervalued US Stocks According to Wall Street Analysts. On August 20, UBS analyst Josh Silverstein lowered the firm’s price target on Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) from $45 to $44, while keeping a Buy rating on the stock. The analyst noted that the persistent commodity headwinds continue to dampen […]

headline: SLB OneSubsea Wins EPC Contract for Equinor's Fram Sor Project
summary: SLB OneSubsea clinches a major EPC deal from Equinor for Fram Sor, set to deploy the first large-scale all-electric subsea system.

raw.headline: SLB OneSubsea Wins EPC Contract for Equinor's Fram Sor Project
raw.summary: SLB OneSubsea clinches a major EPC deal from Equinor for Fram Sor, set to deploy the first large-scale all-electric subsea system.

headline: SLB OneSubsea secures electric SPS EPC contract offshore Norway
summary: The Fram Sør project is set to be developed as a subsea tieback to the Troll C platform in the North Sea.
